name: Soluship Shipping For Woocommerce
author: justintegrateIT Devlopers

sections.description:
SOLUSHIP

Soluship(SOLUtion based SHIPments) is a shipment based project in which service is made globally. Its FREE* to use.

FEATURES

AUTOMATE THE SHIPPING

  • With Easy Store configuration woo-commerce Merchants can avail Soluship shipping will automate the shipping order handle.
  • Once people created sales order from woo-commerce Store, Soluship will create exact shipping order and update the tracking details to your woo-commerce Order.

CHEAPEST SHIPPING

  • If Merchants wants to choose wide variety of shipping rates from many carriers , soluship will provide the shipping rates.

PRINT SHIPPING LABELS

  • Merchants can able get the Carrier shipping labels from soluship by any order or bulk.

CARRIERS WITH SOLUSHIP

  • create shipment by getting the predefined rates with respect to the shipment details provided by the customer, from various services such as UPS, DHL, PUROLATOR, FEDEX etc..,
  • There are some additional functionalities such as pick up request ,EDI import (where multiple shipments can be created by importing an edi file), Track and Search which makes the shipments user friendly.

*Merchants need not pay nothing for App usages. They will pay only for shipping orders in soluship.
sections.installation: Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.faq:
• What is soluship?

 

Soluship(SOLUtion based SHIPments) is a shipment based project in which service is made globally. 

 

  • Is There any prerequisites plug-in required?

To Use Soluship Shipping plugin woo-commerce plugin required.(https://wordpress.org/plugins/woocommerce)

  • Is any cost to use this plugin?

No. It is Free use soluship plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial release.

1.1

  • Updates order view issues

1.1.1

  • Unit package dimension based shipping enabled

1.1.2

  • International shipping duitable amount issues fixed and enabled

1.1.3

  • Default Order Creation Updated , Create / View Status to create shipping label enabled

1.1.4

  • Handled API failures and fixed buges

1.1.5

  • Update cancel shipment API

1.1.6

  • Shipment Creation Integration for payment gateways

1.1.7

  • Shipment Creation performance improved with auto redirected gateways

1.1.8

  • Woocommerce 3.5.2 Deprecated bug fixes

1.1.9

  • Introduced default dimensions and enable functionality.
